net.bytebuddy.instrumentation

Class Forwarding

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bytebuddy.instrumentation.Forwarding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Instrumentation

    public class Forwarding
extends Object
implements Instrumentation
    This instrumentation forwards method invocations to another instance. For this, the intercepted method must be defined on a super type of the given delegation target. Static methods cannot be forwarded as they are not invoked on an instance.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  Forwarding.Appender
      An appender for implementing a Forwarding operation.

      A handler for preparing a Forwarding instrumentation.

    • Method Detail

      • to

        public static Instrumentation to(Object delegate)
        Forwards all intercepted method invocations to the given instance which is stored in a static field of the instrumented class. The field name is generated from the instance's hash code.
        Parameters:
        delegate - The delegate to which all intercepted methods should be forwarded.
        Returns:
        A corresponding instrumentation.

      • to

        public static Instrumentation to(Object delegate,
                                 String fieldName)
        Forwards all intercepted method invocations to the given instance which is stored in a static field of the instrumented class.
        Parameters:
        delegate - The delegate to which all intercepted methods should be forwarded.
        fieldName - The name of the field in which the delegate should be stored.
        Returns:
        A corresponding instrumentation.

      • toStaticField

        public static Instrumentation toStaticField(String fieldName,
                                            Class<?> fieldType)
        Forwards all intercepted method invocations to a static field of the instrumented class. The value of this field must be set explicitly.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - The name of the field in which the delegate should be stored.
        fieldType - The type of the field and thus the type of which the delegate is assumed to be of.
        Returns:
        A corresponding instrumentation.

      • appender

        public ByteCodeAppender appender(Instrumentation.Target instrumentationTarget)
        Description copied from interface: Instrumentation
        Creates a byte code appender that determines the implementation of the instrumented type's methods.
        Specified by:
        appender in interface Instrumentation
        Parameters:
        instrumentationTarget - The target of the current instrumentation.
        Returns:
        A byte code appender for implementing methods delegated to this instrumentation. This byte code appender is also responsible for handling methods that were added by this instrumentation on the call to Instrumentation.prepare(net.bytebuddy.instrumentation.type.InstrumentedType).

      • prepare

        public InstrumentedType prepare(InstrumentedType instrumentedType)
        Description copied from interface: Instrumentation
        During the preparation phase of an instrumentation, implementations are eligible to adding fields or methods to the currently instrumented type. All methods that are added by this instrumentation are required to be implemented by the ByteCodeAppender that is emitted on the call to Instrumentation.appender(net.bytebuddy.instrumentation.Instrumentation.Target) call. On this method call, loaded type initializers can also be added to the instrumented type.
        Specified by:
        prepare in interface Instrumentation
        Parameters:
        instrumentedType - The instrumented type that is the basis of the ongoing instrumentation.
        Returns:
        The instrumented type with any applied changes, if any.
